game.name: Full Stride
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Full Stride is a jockey racing game featuring a first-person riding view, skill-based controls, and racecourses built in 3D. Players manage speed, stamina, and positioning to compete in various race conditions.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Full Stride is a jockey racing game featuring a first-person riding view, skill-based controls, and racecourses built in 3D. Players manage speed, stamina, and positioning to compete in various race conditions.
